content.description: Campus problem goes at V7 starts on solid crimp rail, left on sharp shallow crimp, right on slightly better crimp directly right.Â
content.protection: Pads and spotters, landings in the talus are are sketchy.
content.location: Left side of the prow when looking at it from the front.

content.description: If it weren't for the horrendous landing, this line would be absolutely perfect. Traverse on a good edge that becomes increasingly slopey as you get higher off the deck. There is a nice transition where the arete jogs slightly before the holds get a bit more sparse for the crux as you (hypothetically) pull around the nose of Pride Rock and top out right next to the top of the Lion King Project.
content.protection: Many pads, many spotters, and a solid understanding of consequences.
content.location: On the front side of Pride Rock (visible from the bottom of the talus field), opposite the Lion King Project. Traverse the arete from the far right side out to the nose of Pride Rock.

content.description: Obvious large prow at the top of the talus area.
